item.title: 特朗普准备对等征收关税，亚洲成为箭靶
item.description: 我是驻香港的亚洲经济记者 Katia Dmitrieva。今天，我们将关注互惠关税对亚洲的冲击。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Katia Dmitrieva, Asia economics reporter in Hong Kong. Today we’re looking at reciprocal tariffs hitting Asia. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net or get in touch on X via @economics. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 特朗普关税面临宪法问题
item.description: 贸易和经济政策通常不会导致富国的宪政危机。但是，当唐纳德-特朗普总统准备公布关税，这将成为美国经济管理的一个历史性里程碑时，值得指出的是，他不会按照共和国建国文件所设想的方式行事。【原文：Trade and economic policy do not often lead to rich-world constitutional crises. But as President Donald Trump prepares to unveil tariffs set to be a historic milestone in the management of the US economy, it’s worth pointing out he won’t be doing it the way the republic’s founding document envisions.】

item.title: 洛杉矶大火灾民押宝激进想法帮助重建家园
item.description:
随着成本的飙升和气候风险的增加，洛杉矶的复苏没有简单的答案。因此，阿尔塔蒂纳的一个街区正齐心协力重建家园。【原文：

As costs soar and climate risks mount, there are no easy answers for LA’s recovery. So one block in Altadena is working together to get home.

】

item.title: GAM 基金经理麦克纳马拉和比格斯在 Gramercy 交易中退出
item.description: 随着瑞士资产管理公司将其新兴市场债务策略外包给 Gramercy Funds Management LLC，GAM Holding AG 任职时间最长的两位基金经理即将离职。【原文：Two of the longest-serving fund managers at GAM Holding AG are leaving, as the Swiss asset manager outsources its emerging-market debt strategies to Gramercy Funds Management LLC.】

item.title: 华尔街希望买入股市下跌行情，问题是何时买入
item.description: 与世界其他地区相比，美国股市即将结束自 20 世纪 80 年代以来最糟糕的一个季度。【原文：The US stock market is about to conclude its worst quarter compared to the rest of the world since the 1980s.】

item.title: 铀市场因关税威胁而冻结，潜在买家受到冲击
item.description: 由于美国核电公司受到唐纳德-特朗普总统关税威胁的惊吓，减缓了采购速度并推迟了新合同的签订，北美铀市场正陷入停滞。【原文：The North American uranium market is grinding to a halt as US nuclear-power companies spooked by President Donald Trump’s tariff threats slow purchases and delay new contracts.】

item.title: 雷诺、日产联盟调整，为更多股份销售敞开大门
item.description: 雷诺汽车公司（Renault SA）和日产汽车公司（Nissan Motor Co.【原文：Renault SA and Nissan Motor Co. updated their long-term alliance, paving the way for more share sales as the Japanese automaker remains under pressure to shore up its finances.】

item.title: 俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司将通过土耳其天然气管道增加对斯洛伐克的天然气供应
item.description: 斯洛伐克将从俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司（Gazprom PJSC）通过土耳其和匈牙利的 TurkStream 输气管道获得更多的天然气，从而缓解经由乌克兰的天然气输送被切断后的供应担忧。【原文：Slovakia will receive a substantially larger portion of Gazprom PJSC gas deliveries via Turkey and Hungary through the TurkStream pipeline, easing supply concerns after flows via Ukraine were cut off.】

item.title: 诺和诺德自 2002 年以来最糟糕的一个月凸显增长隐忧
item.description: 随着诺和诺德（Novo Nordisk A/S）股价创下二十多年来最差的一个月，这家丹麦制药商估值超过 6000 亿美元的日子正在成为遥远的记忆。【原文：As Novo Nordisk A/S shares head for their worst month in more than two decades, the days when the Danish drugmaker was valued at more than $600 billion are becoming a distant memory.】

item.title: 波兰通胀令央行鹰派观点更受质疑
item.description: 波兰 3 月份的通胀率连续第四个月低于经济学家的预期，加深了人们对中央银行预测物价将持续增长的担忧。【原文：Polish inflation undershot economist expectations for a fourth straight month in March, deepening concerns over central bank projections predicting sticky price growth.】

item.title: 市场操纵的遗留问题推动对冲规则的制定
item.description: 全球监管机构今年将针对一种有争议的交易行为制定新的规则，这一努力正在金融业中划分界线。【原文：An effort by global regulators to set new rules this year on a controversial trading practice is drawing dividing lines across the financial industry.】

item.title: 拉里-芬克誓言为大众开启私人投资之门
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.首席执行官拉里-芬克（Larry Fink）承诺向数百万普通投资者，而不仅仅是少数富人开放私人市场，他认为个人应该分享更多经济增长带来的收益。【原文：BlackRock Inc. Chief Executive Officer Larry Fink pledged to open up private markets to millions of everyday investors, not just the wealthy few, contending individuals should share more of the gains from economic growth.】

item.title: 美国企业因关税和减税等待而搁置支出计划
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统在 11 月大选中获胜，推动了企业乐观情绪和资本支出预期的飙升。四个月后，企业高管已转入观望模式。【原文：President Donald Trump’s November election win drove a surge in business optimism and expectations for capital spending. Four months later, executives have shifted to wait-and-see mode.】

item.title: 本周股票投资者 "事关重大
item.description: 市场数据截至美国东部时间上午 05:35。根据供应商协议，市场数据可能会有所延迟。【原文：Market data as of 05:35 am EST. Market data may be delayed depending on provider agreements.】

item.title: 意大利邮政现在运营意大利电信，交易可能随之而来
item.description: 在被法国控制十年之后，意大利电信公司（Telecom Italia SpA）现在有了一个意大利国家支持的集团作为其最大的投资者，而且这个集团希望促进电信市场的并购。【原文：After a decade under French control, Telecom Italia SpA now has an Italian state-backed group as its top investor — and it’s one that wants to foster mergers and acquisitions in the telecoms market.】

item.title: 英国财政监督机构如何掌控 1.5 万亿英镑的财政预算
item.description: 英国预算责任办公室（Office for Budget Responsibility）是美国国会预算办公室（Congressional Budget Office）的缩小版，成立时间可能只有 15 年，但已经成为英国最有影响力的机构之一。【原文：Britain’s Office for Budget Responsibility, a slimmed-down version of the Congressional Budget Office in the US, may be just 15 years old but it’s already one of the most powerful players in the UK.】

item.title: 美股低相关性警示买入时机尚未成熟
item.description: 一个股市信号正在向希望从今年股市大幅下挫中迅速复苏的投资者发出警告。【原文：A stock-market signal is flashing a warning to investors hoping for a speedy recovery from this year’s sharp equity selloff.】

item.title: 麦格理认为石油价格将跌至 60 美元以下，炼油短缺问题迫在眉睫
item.description: 麦格理集团（Macquarie Group Ltd.）预测，由于市场仍然供过于求，石油价格可能会跌至每桶 60 美元的低位，而上一次出现这一价格是在 2021 年。【原文：Oil will likely fall to the low $60-a-barrel range — levels last seen in 2021 — as markets remain oversupplied, Macquarie Group Ltd. predicts.】

item.title: 穆迪就债务问题发出警告后莫桑比克美元债券下滑
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）下调了对这个东南非国家本币债务的评估，并警告将出现 "严重的流动性 "危机，此后莫桑比克的美元债券连续第四天下滑。【原文：Mozambique’s dollar bonds slid for a fourth straight day after Moody’s Ratings cut its assessment of the southeast African nation’s local currency debt and warned of a “severe liquidity” crunch.】

item.title: 意大利通胀率自 2023 年以来首次超过 2
item.description: 意大利通胀加速超过预期，18 个月来首次超过欧洲央行 2% 的目标。【原文：Italian inflation accelerated more than anticipated to exceed the European Central Bank’s 2% target for the first time in 18 months.】

item.title: 诺基亚与亚马逊就流媒体技术专利纠纷达成和解
item.description: 诺基亚公司（Nokia Oyj）和亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc.【原文：Nokia Oyj and Amazon.com Inc. settled a patent dispute over streaming technologies that had spread to courts across three continents.】

item.title: 关税倒计时引发风险资产出逃，美国国债大涨
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普本周晚些时候宣布贸易关税之前，全球市场一片惶恐，美国国债跳涨，令已经对经济放缓心有余悸的投资者感到不安。【原文：US Treasuries jumped as trepidation swept through global markets ahead of President Donald Trump’s expected trade tariff announcements later this week, rankling investors already on edge over an economic slowdown.】

item.title: 美国收税缓慢引发对债务上限的担忧 X 日期
item.description: 税收预测下降。退税增加。如果这种情况持续下去，预示着国会提高债务上限的最后期限将提前，否则将面临联邦债务违约的风险。【原文：Tax collection projections are down. Refunds are up. That’s a formula that could dampen US government revenue and, if it persists, portend an earlier deadline for Congress to raise the debt ceiling — or risk a federal payments default.】

item.title: 英国房贷需求放缓，因为减税时间已所剩无几
item.description: 由于购房者急于赶在税收截止日期前购房的积极性继续减弱，英国 2 月份的抵押贷款审批量有所下滑。【原文：UK mortgage approvals dipped in February, as the boost from homebuyers rushing to beat a tax deadline continued to wane.】

item.title: 欧洲监管机构寻求削减资产支持市场的繁文缛节
item.description: 据一份为决策者提供建议的报告称，欧洲金融当局正在探索如何精简对 1.2 万亿欧元（1.3 万亿美元）资产支持证券市场的监管，并简化报告要求。【原文：European financial authorities are exploring ways to streamline oversight of the €1.2 trillion ($1.3 trillion) asset-backed securities market and simplify reporting requirements, according to a report that offers recommendations for policymakers.】

item.title: 中国智璞公司提供免费人工智能代理，反击 DeepSeek 和 Manus
item.description: 随着国内新兴人工智能技术的竞争日趋白热化，中国智普公司正在免费提供其新的人工智能代理。【原文：China’s Zhipu is making its new AI agent free to use as domestic competition to build emerging artificial intelligence technologies heats up.】

item.title: 南非陷入困境的 Eskom 公司获准违反排放规定
item.description: 南非允许国有企业 Eskom Holdings SOC Ltd. 经营的八家燃煤电厂违反排放规定，以帮助这家资金短缺的公用事业公司集中资源提供稳定的电力供应。【原文：South Africa allowed eight coal-fired plants run by state-owned Eskom Holdings SOC Ltd. to breach emission rules in an attempt to help the cash-strapped utility focus resources on providing a steady supply of electricity.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长帕内塔称抗击通胀之战尚未获胜
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员法比奥-帕内塔（Fabio Panetta）表示，抑制通胀的斗争尚未结束，并警告说，全球不确定性的上升要求在降低利率时谨慎行事。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Fabio Panetta said the fight to tame inflation isn’t finished, warning that rising global uncertainty requires a careful approach to lowering interest rates.】

item.title: 专家组发现富士媒体高管助长骚扰文化
item.description: 一项独立调查发现，富士媒体控股公司（Fuji Media Holdings Inc.【原文：Fuji Media Holdings Inc.’s TV arm created an environment that structurally exposed young employees to the risk of sexual harassment by actors and other performers, an independent investigation found.】

item.title: 美国制裁刺激技术研究，华为意外亏损
item.description: 华为技术有限公司（Huawei Technologies Co.）公布了多年来首次季度净亏损，此前该公司在电动汽车和芯片等领域的研究投入巨大，但整体业务却放缓。【原文：Huawei Technologies Co. posted its first quarterly net loss in years after the company spent aggressively on research in areas from EVs to chips while the business as a whole slowed.】
